mapper.select: SELECT memberid, password, grade, gubun, openflag, name, telephone, handphone, address, address_etc, introduce, latitude, longitude, usestartdate, useenddate, deleteyn, lastconnecttime, regtime FROM member WHERE deleteyn = 0 AND gubun = #{gubun} AND latitude = #{latitude} AND longitude = #{longitude} AND openflag = #{openflag} AND memberid = #{memberid}
